item.title: Geoetris
item.description: Mi first generative project on fx(hash). Squares and ellipses evolving into abstract art.

item.title: Isomeric doppelgangers
item.description: This came from my background in bioinformatics. The theory behind this, and the use of WEBGL remainds me the molecular structures of proteins.

item.title: Yo automata
item.description: Three types of art on the same gentk.

item.title: Yo automata
item.description: A cellular automaton is a model of a system of “cell” objects with the following characteristics. The cells live on a grid. (We’ll see examples in both one and two dimensions in this chapter, though a cellular automaton can exist in any finite number of dimensions.) Each cell has a state. The number of state possibilities is typically finite. The simplest example has the two possibilities of 1 and 0 (otherwise referred to as “on” and “off” or “alive” and “dead”).
